content: **the 10 doll wrap skirt crochet pattern is perfect for creating an adorable and stylish addition to any doll s wardrobe this pattern is worked top down by creating the waist band first button placement will be determined by the exact measurement of your doll finished skirt should measure approx 11 wide at the bottom & 3 tall ** if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ ***materials *** mainstays yarn approx 32 yds h 5 mm hook scissors needle 1 10-12mm button ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip sts = stitches st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet blo = back loop only copyright 2024 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p designs no content may be duplicated without express written consent by purchasing/downloading/using any regina p designs patterns you agree to the terms of use -all regina p designs patterns are for personal use only -it is prohibited to reproduce copy publish in any form including video or distribute this pattern its parts or photos in any way or form including translations into foreign languages -you are free to do as you wish with the finished products made from these patterns with the agreement that regina p designs will be credited for the pattern itself return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final if you have a problem with working out parts of a pattern please contact the designer for help
